components.description:
A swirl of brown poop, shaped like soft-serve ice cream with large, excited eyes and frequently a big, friendly smile.

Widely agreed to have been inspired by the various poop-shaped characters within the Dr. Slump manga series by Akira Toriyama.

May be used to represent feces and other bathroom topics as well as stand in for their many related slang terms. It also enjoys a wide range of idiosyncratic applications, such as conveying a sense of whimsy or silliness, given its fun, happy expression.

Microsoft and Google previously depicted a literal pile of feces, Google’s design featuring stink lines and flies hovering above it.

Available as an Apple Animoji.
components.title: Pile of Poo

description:

title: Pile of Poo

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Comic style symbols
emoji_net_data.definition: A pile of poo that is shaped like a soft-serve ice cream.Â Brown in color with a friendly smile in most versions of this emoji. Previously sh http://emojipedia.org/pile-of-poo/

bn:00112223a: Displeasing to the eye; not aesthetically pleasing.

bn:00102912a: Having or relating to the smell of funk.
Of, relating to, or characteristic of putrefaction, especially having a bad smell, like that of rotting flesh.

bn:13665682a: Like poo; crappy, of low quality.

bn:00104556a: Having a strong, unpleasant smell; stinking.

bn:00084350v: To excrete feces from one's body through the anus.
To empty one's bowels of feces.
To empty the bowels of feces.

bn:00087460v: To consume something solid or semi-solid (usually food) by putting it into the mouth and eventually swallowing it.
To consume (something solid or semi-solid, usually food) by putting it into the mouth and swallowing it.

bn:13669747v: To use the toilet, or assist (a child etc) in using the toilet

bn:00092606v: To have or give off a strong, unpleasant smell.
To have a strong bad smell.

bn:00970869n: A small, near-conical piece of chocolate.
Chocolate chips are small chunks of chocolate.
A small, usually near-conical piece of chocolate.

bn:13676870n: The release of feces, often unintentionally, during flatulation.

bn:00036679n: Frozen yogurt is a frozen dessert made with yogurt and sometimes other dairy products.
A frozen dessert made from yogurt or other dairy products, slightly tarter than ice cream and lower in fat.
A soft frozen dessert of sweetened flavored yogurt

bn:00011625n: Waste product from an animal's digestive tract
Digested waste material (typically solid or semi-solid) discharged from the bowels; excrement.
The elimination of fecal waste through the anus.
Solid excretory product evacuated from the bowels; feces.
Feces, or faeces, also known as excrement, is waste product from an animal's digestive tract expelled through the anus or cloaca during a process called defecation.
Waste product from an animal's or a human's digestive tract expelled through the anus, including synonyms crap and shit
What a dogs body releases from time to time as a little pile of waste remaining from digestion, after it has been collected in the colon.
Solid excretory product evacuated from the bowels
Animal solid waste excreted from the bowels; feces.
Substance that human and animal bodies release from time to time as a little pile of waste remaining from digestion, after it has been collected in the colon.

bn:00025860n: Act or process of voiding excrement.
Defecation is the final act of digestion, by which organisms eliminate solid, semisolid, and/or liquid waste material from the digestive tract via the anus.
The elimination of fecal waste through the anus.
The elimination of fecal waste through the anus
The act or process by which organisms eliminate feces
Act or process of voiding feces from bowels.

bn:00065123n: A type of cake or dessert cooked usually by boiling or steaming.
Pudding is usually a dessert, but it can also be a savory dish.
Boiled or steamed cake or dessert.
Any of various soft sweet desserts thickened usually with flour and baked or boiled or steamed
A dessert or a savory dish.

bn:00015106n: A plumbing fixture for defecation and urination
A toilet is a sanitation fixture used primarily for the disposal of human urine and feces.
A sanitation fixture used primarily for the disposal of human excrement and urine
A ceramic device used for depositing and removing human excrement with water through flushing.
A chamber pot is a bowl-shaped container with a handle, and often a lid, kept in the bedroom under a bed or in the cabinet of a nightstand and generally used as a toilet at night.

bn:00026886n: Frequent and watery bowel movements; can be a symptom of infection or food poisoning or colitis or a gastrointestinal tumor
A condition in which the sufferer has frequent and watery bowel movements.
Diarrhea or diarrhoea is the condition of having at least three loose or liquid bowel movements each day.

bn:00018649n: A kiss that consists of a conical bite-sized piece of chocolate

bn:00027620n: A sudden violent feeling of disgust.
Disgust is an emotional response of revulsion to something considered offensive or unpleasant.
A feeling of aversion or antipathy
An attitude or a feeling of distaste or aversion.
Extreme hatred or detestation; the feeling of utter dislike.
A feeling of aversion or antipathy.
The feeling of extreme disgust and hatred; abhorrence; detestation; loathing.

bn:00036674n: A cold dessert similar to ice cream, made with eggs in addition to cream and sugar.
A kind of semiliquid ice cream that is squirted out into cones or cups.
Dessert resembling ice cream but with a boiled custard base
A frozen dessert or snack, similar to ice cream but softer, as a result of air being introduced during freezing.
Soft serve is a type of ice cream that is softer than regular ice cream, as a result of air being introduced during freezing.
Frozen custard is a cold dessert similar to ice cream, but made with eggs in addition to cream and sugar.

bn:00036669n: The sweet glaze used in confectionery

Icing, often called frosting in the United States, is a sweet, often creamy glaze made of sugar with a liquid, such as water or milk, that is often enriched with ingredients like butter, egg whites, cream cheese, or flavorings.
A flavored sugar topping used to coat and decorate cakes
A sugary coating for cakes and other baked goods.
A sweet glaze made primarily of sugar and often flavored, typically used for baked goods; frosting.
Glaze used on cookies or cakes

bn:00023556n: An English word usually considered vulgar and profane.
Substance that human and animal bodies release from time to time as a little pile of waste remaining from digestion, after it has been collected in the colon.
Shit is an English word that is usually considered vulgar and profane in Modern English.
The word shit, regarded as a vulgar or taboo word.

bn:00018653n: Sweet chocolate flavored custard-like pudding usually thickened with flour rather than eggs
Chocolate puddings are a class of desserts with chocolate flavors.

bn:00018648n: Chocolate ice cream is ice cream with natural or artificial chocolate flavoring.
